'''Jan Broberg''' ([[9 December]] [[1932]] - [[29 March]] [[2012]]) was a Swedish author, literary critic and a leading expert in Sweden on crime, detective and mystery stories.<ref>[http://sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Broberg Swedish Wikipedia] and ''[http://www.angelfire.com/pop2/hakangbg/broberg.html Jan Broberg Index]'' (external links)</ref>

In [[1961]], Broberg corresponded with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (see letter ''[[Letter to Jan Broberg]]''), suggesting [[1961 Jan Broberg|an interview]], that was to be published in a Swedish-language edition.
